is a small village and beach in

value: : next to Vlichada beach. One of the best low-end taverns on the Santorini island for traditional local dishes and seafood. Shrimps are fresh (which can't be found far from sea); great taramasalata. Sutsukaki: tomato is thinner, lacks herbs, rich in batter -- still great. Souvlaki is the same as elsewhere.
